00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements hyperbolic functions
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Function::hyperbolic;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::Function);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that the argument is numeric (complex or real)
00011 #
00012 sub _check {(shift)->checkNumeric(@_)}
00013 
00014 #
00015 #  For complex arguments, call the complex version,
00016 #  Otherwise call the version below.
00017 #
00018 sub _eval {
00019   my $self = shift; my $name = $self->{name};
00020   return $_[0]->$name if Value::isComplex($_[0]);
00021   $self->$name(@_);
00022 }
00023 
00024 #
00025 #  Check the arguments and return the (real or complex) result.
00026 #
00027 sub _call {
00028   my $self = shift; my $name = shift;
00029   Value::Error("Function '%s' has too many inputs",$name) if scalar(@_) > 1;
00030   Value::Error("Function '%s' has too few inputs",$name) if scalar(@_) == 0;
00031   my $n = $_[0];
00032   return $self->$name($n) if Value::matchNumber($n);
00033   my $context = (Value::isValue($n) ? $n : $self)->context;
00034   $self->Package("Complex")->promote($context,$n)->$name;
00035 }
00036 
00037 #
00038 #  Should make better errors about division by zero,
00039 #  roots of negatives here, and undefined logs.
00040 #
00041 sub sinh {shift; (CORE::exp($_[0]) - CORE::exp(-$_[0]))/2}
00042 sub cosh {shift; (CORE::exp($_[0]) + CORE::exp(-$_[0]))/2}
00043 sub tanh {shift; (CORE::exp($_[0]) - CORE::exp(-$_[0]))/(CORE::exp($_[0]) + CORE::exp(-$_[0]))}
00044 sub sech {shift; 2/(CORE::exp($_[0]) + CORE::exp(-$_[0]))}
00045 sub csch {shift; 2/(CORE::exp($_[0]) - CORE::exp(-$_[0]))}
00046 sub coth {shift; (CORE::exp($_[0]) + CORE::exp(-$_[0]))/(CORE::exp($_[0]) - CORE::exp(-$_[0]))}
00047 
00048 sub asinh {shift; CORE::log($_[0]+CORE::sqrt($_[0]*$_[0]+1))}
00049 sub acosh {shift; CORE::log($_[0]+CORE::sqrt($_[0]*$_[0]-1))}
00050 sub atanh {shift; CORE::log((1+$_[0])/(1-$_[0]))/2}
00051 sub asech {shift; CORE::log((1+CORE::sqrt(1-$_[0]*$_[0]))/$_[0])}
00052 sub acsch {shift; CORE::log((1+CORE::sqrt(1+$_[0]*$_[0]))/$_[0])}
00053 sub acoth {shift; CORE::log(($_[0]+1)/($_[0]-1))/2}
00054 
00055 #########################################################################
00056 
00057 1;
